frontmatter.title: Do not let your heart be troubled
frontmatter.description: There is so much grief going on with the world right now due to COVID 19.You may feel totally helpless. It is normal to have these feelings. As we can't do anything on our own about it. We need God. God is our refuge and strength.So remember that and don't let your heart be troubled.

frontmatter.title: Joy in a divided world
frontmatter.description: Joy is not dependent on outward things.  Joy comes from inward things when you have rest in your soul. Joy comes from having one mind. A mind that is like Jesus Christ.  in control. This passage give us the blueprint on how to remain joyous

frontmatter.title: Joy in any Circumstance
frontmatter.description: Sometimes it may be hard to remain joyous under intense situations like what we are going through with the Corona Virus. However, it's important to remember that God is in control. This passage give us the blueprint on how to remain joyous

frontmatter.title: Welcome to my site
frontmatter.description: Hello guest! Welcome to my Site

frontmatter.title: Three years in Christ
frontmatter.description: Three years it has been! Three years I have been set free. Three years I am no longer a slave to sin. Three glorious years it has been. Three years I have been blessed by God's overflowing mercy and grace when He saved a sinner like me.

frontmatter.title: What to do when life falls apart
frontmatter.description: The Corona Virus has caused many to fear. Some to question if the world is really falling apart. Do you feel this way? How do you respond?Some will turn to social media. Which, could cause you to panic. Some may turn to drugs. Some may turn to alcohol. Some may even consider suicide. What should we really do? Turn to God. He is your refuge and your strength!
